Pre-Game Insights: The Nets are looking to stop a 3-game slide against the Nuggets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets have gone 11-7 in home games.
Denver averages 12.0 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.6 fewer makes per game than the Nets allow (13.6).
The Nets are shooting 44.8% from the field, 1.8% lower than the 46.6% the Nuggets' opponents have shot this season.
Nikola Jokic is averaging 31.5 points, 13 rebounds, 9.7 assists and 1.7 steals for the Nuggets.
Cameron Johnson is scoring 19.5 points per game with 4.3 rebounds and 3.0 assists for the Nets.
Others: The Nets are 8-12 on the road.
The Nuggets average 13.6 turnovers per game and is 8-5 when it has fewer turnovers than its opponents.
The Nets have a 3-15 record in games decided by 10 or more points.
The Nuggets' opponents have shot 46.6% from the field this season.
The Nets are averaging 100.5 points, 42.4 rebounds, 23.9 assists, 8.1 steals and 2.9 blocks per game while shooting 42.2% from the field.
The Nuggets have a 6-4 record in their last 10 games, averaging 122.1 points, 45.2 rebounds, 32.1 assists, 7.8 steals and 4.6 blocks per game while shooting 50.3% from the field.
